## Project Stack
- Frontend: React 19 with TypeScript (Vite)
- Styling: Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Node.js with Express
- Features: Google-style login page with two-step authentication flow

## Quick Start
```bash
npm run dev      # Start React frontend
npm run server   # Start Node.js backend
```
